pages.text: $(li)Potatoes can be plant in Farmland to generate more Potatoes.$(br)$(li)You can put Potatoes in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.$(br)$(li)Farmers will exchanges your potatoes by Emeralds.
$(li)You can use Potatoes to craft a Seed Pouch, Potato Crate, or a Beef Stew in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)You can cook Baked Potatoes Smelting potatoes in a Furnace, Smoking or Campfire.
